name: Arabian Nights
description:
Endure many trials and solve many challenges as you enter into the exciting and magical world of Arabian Nights.

Legends tell that, once upon a time, a mighty Sultan met a mystical genie who fulfilled his wish for many descendants and granted him five daughters, all born the same day…

A Sultan’s daughter must be wed on the day of her twentieth birthday. Failing to do so, she will be banished from the palace and deprived of all her royal rights.

Now the five princesses have mysteriously disappeared, on the day before their twentieth birthday.

Take on the role of Ali, the dashing young hero. Run, jump, climb, walk the tightrope, throw knives and explosives and cast magic spells, on a quest to find the Sultan’s five daughters. Ali’s reward will be to wed them and become the sole heir to the Sultan’s throne.

Overcome numerous obstacles in exciting locations - the crypt, the town, the gardens and the Palace - all set against sumptuous and mythical backdrops. The Grand Vizier, the Genie, the Sacred Tiger and the Executioner will all attempt to make your quest impossible.

Features:
  • A progressive storyline with the perfect combination of action and adventure, fantasy and danger
  • Immersive and beautiful environments
  • Fight hand-to-hand combats using your mighty scimitar
  • 1st episode built-in tutorial
  • Original and captivating musical score
